items.title: Market Today: Ratan Tata dies, TCS Q2, GIFT Nifty up 100 pts, Israel war
items.description: At 6:30 AM, GIFT Nifty Futures were up 123 points at 25,207, indicating a gap-up opening for the Indian bourses.

items.title: Should you sell Nifty Auto, IT on rise? Here' what analysts recommend
items.description: The Nifty IT Index is currently trading close to its key resistance level, making it a prime candidate for a "sell on rise" strategy for near-term traders. The resistance level to watch is 43,200

items.title: Buy & Sell, Oct 10; top stock picks by Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking
items.description: Havells witnessed a sharp rally after a breakout from multi-month consolidation phase. However, in line with market corrective phase, the stock retraced towards the neckline of its previous breakout

items.title: Stocks to Watch: Tata stocks, AEL, Vedanta, JSW Infra, ICICI Sec, Jio Fin
items.description: Stock Market Today: Star Health Insurance is undergoing a forensic investigation after a significant data breach affecting 31 million customers.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India markets; Tata group stocks eyed
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 100 points ahead, signalled a higher open for the Indian markets on Thursday.

items.title: Dividend, stock-split: Coforge, Softsol, 4 others under spotlight today
items.description: Here is the full list of stocks that will trade ex-date tomorrow for major corporate announcements, such as dividends, rights issue, subdivision, and demerger

items.title: GR Infraprojects shares soar 6% on bagging 'LoA' for Nagpur Metro Project
items.description: Shares of GR Infraprojects surged up to 5.81 per cent at Rs 1,730 per share on the BSE in Thursday's early morning trade

items.title: PNC Infratech emerges lowest bidder for project of Rs 2091-cr; shares up 7%
items.description: The PNC Infratech share soared after the company announced that it has been declared at the lowest bidder for a project of Rs 2,090.59 crore from CIDCO

items.title: Nifty weekly expiry in focus; FIIs pile up bearish bets in Bank Nifty
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 10: FIIs open positions in Bank Nifty up over 200% since the start of Oct; overall long-short ratio in index futures now at lowest level since June.

items.title: Garuda Construction IPO ends today: GMP falls flat; should you bid?
items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Garuda Construction IPO, which has been oversubscribed 4.10 times, concludes today

items.title: Ratan Tata death: Tata Group stocks trade mixed; TaMo down 2%, TCS up 1%
items.description: Ratan Tata News: Tata Chemicals, Indian Hotels Company, Tejas Networks, Voltas, Tata Elxsi and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) were up in the range of 1 per cent to 4 per cent

items.title: RCF share price rallies 8% on awarding Rs 1,000-crore order to L&T; details
items.description: The RCF share price surged after the company announced that it has awarded an order of a little over Rs 1,000 crore to L&T Energy Hydrocarbon division of L&T.

items.title: It has been stock picker's market since quite some time now: Rajesh Bhatia
items.description: Our emphasis is on careful stock selection within sectors, rather than making significant overweight or underweight sector bets, Bhatia said

items.title: ICICI Securities slides over 3% as NCLT approves delisting plans; details
items.description: ICICI Securities share price dipped as much as 3.42 per cent to Rs 837.65 per share on the BSE in Thursday's early morning trade
